sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都含有"解释"或"说明"之意。
means: explanation ： 普通用词，指使人明白未知或不清楚的事。
definition ： 主要指对某一词、短语或专门术语的含义作解释、下定义。
description ： 指对某一事物的重要方面进行详细叙述，常含教育与启迪意味。
exposition ： 通常指对论点、假设、理论等的重点作详尽的阐述。
interpretation ： 多指对文字上较难的段落，或难于理解，令人迷惑的问题作出解释或说明。

word_mean: 以现代科学手段，从宏观角度对药材或饮片的外形特征用科学名词进行详细准确的描述。

sentence.Network_en: We were in a disaster situation that defies description.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们陷入了难以言表的糟糕处境。

sentence.Network_en: Two men answer-ing the description of the suspects tried to enter Switzerland.
sentence.Network_cn: 与描述的疑犯样子相符的两名男子试图进入瑞士。

sentence.Network_en: Her description of the nature and action of poisons is amazingly accurate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对一些毒药的性质和作用的描述惊人地准确。

jx.jx_en_mean: to a great and astonishing extent

lj.lj_ly: his face was swollen beyond description.

jx.jx_en_mean: be so unusual or remarkable as to be impossible to describe

lj.lj_ly: the sheer scale of the Requiem defies description.
lj.lj_ls: 安魂弥撒的规模大得无法形容。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin descriptio(n-), from describere 'write down'

entry.def: A description of someone or something is an account which explains what they are or what they look like.

example.ex: Police have issued a description of the man who was aged between fifty and sixty...
example.tran: 警方已经发布了那名年龄在 50 到 60 岁之间的男子的相貌特征通告。

example.ex: ...a detailed description of the movements and battle plans of Italy's fleet...
example.tran: 有关意大利舰队的行动和作战计划的详细说明

entry.def: If something is of a particular description, it belongs to the general class of items that are mentioned.

example.ex: ...the oldest Catholic church of any description in England...
example.tran: 英国所有天主教堂中最古老的一座

example.ex: Events of this description occurred daily.

entry.def: You can say that something is beyond description, or that it defies description, to emphasize that it is very unusual, impressive, terrible, or extreme.

example.ex: His face is weary beyond description...
example.tran: 他一脸难以形容的疲惫。

example.ex: We were in a disaster situation that defies description.
example.tran: 我们陷入了难以言表的糟糕处境。

means.word_mean: 1. a statement that represents something in words

auth_sentence.content: Her own, somewhat quaint description of this behaviour?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her own, somewhat quaint description of this behaviour?

auth_sentence.res_content: But the job description of each is quite different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the job description of each is quite different.

auth_sentence.content: The description of "factory farms" is inaccurate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The description of "factory farms" is inaccurate.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con大家+script写→大家写上名字→征兵
in进入+script写+ion表名词→写进去→刻写
prescript[n.命令,规定]+ion表名词→n.药方,处方;命令

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剧本[原稿];手稿,原稿;笔迹,手迹
stems_affixes.word_buile: script写→n.剧本[原稿];手稿,原稿;笔迹,手迹
script写+ure表名词→写出[宗教]作品
trans转移+script写→把写的东西移到[另一张纸上]→transcript副本
con大家+script写→大家写上名字→征兵

Sentence.sentence: If he keeps the palm of the hand parallel to the floor, as he would in his own culture when making known the height of a child, for example, he will very likely be greeted by laughter, in Colombia this gesture is reserved for the description of animals.

sentences.en: Can you give me a description of the thief?
sentences.cn: 你能给我描述一下那个窃贼的模样吗?

sentences.en: A comprehensive description is one that is full and complete.
sentences.cn: 一篇详尽的描写就是一篇充实完整的描写。

sentences.en: The show featured dogs of every description.
sentences.cn: 展览会中展示了各式各样的狗。

jushi.english: I think it's a bird of some description.
We entertained the guests with a detailed description of the party.
jushi.chinese: 我们给客人详细地介绍了晚会的情况。

jushi.english: The prisoner measures up to the description the police have of the wanted jewel thief.
jushi.chinese: 这个囚犯同警方描绘的受通缉的盗窃珠宝犯的特征完全相符。
